website_summaries.verdict: Although no upper weight limit is listed, these extra-long fork extensions seem to be able to handle around 2,000 pounds. You'll need to center the weight closer to the forklift than the ends, though, to keep the extenders from bending.
pros: Steel retaining straps to hold extensions in place
For use on forks up to 4 inches wide
cons: May bend more easily than expected – no specific weight limit listed

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, well finished. Please note they have weight limits, and like most others, will bend if overloaded/abused.
customer_reviews.text: These are reasonably priced and well made/finished. Please note they do have their weight limits and will bend if overloaded. We're using them for improved handing stability on lighter long/awkward pallets, not so much on very heavy pallets. Remember to contact then with your phone number to arrange shipping/delivery as noted in the Amazon post. Titan did an excellent job shipping. FedEx ground did a great job and delivered one day early. Photos and description on the Amazon page are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have these at a few of my warehouses now and I only wish I would have purchased them sooner. I am not sure of the weight capacity but they are very durable and have handled everything that I need them for. Easy to put on and take off by one person. I will be buying them for the rest of my warehouses soon. Can't beat the price and free shipping.....
customer_reviews.author: Hittmanj3

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Over length pallet for regular 48" forks. Lifted 2000 pounds, spread over the 48" forks and the remaining portion of these 84" extensions. Extensions bent. Not at all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Working great, unless you’re using them on a tractor
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, working great. Using on my tractor. Update: unless you taking things directly off a trailer and siting them down (or driving on Only smooth terrain) they will not stay on you forks. I do not recommend them for tractor use!
customer_reviews.author: J. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Good budget option
customer_reviews.text: A budget option fork extension. Good for light use, I wouldn’t recommend for a business where these get used heavily. There are slight bends in the back of the fork where it holds the fork to the carriage, doesn’t effect anything right now but could potentially fail at some point?!
customer_reviews.author: sl2ls1

customer_reviews.title: Great fork extensions
customer_reviews.text: These fork extensions have proven very useful around the shop. We’re now able to lift snowmobiles quickly and easily, without damaging the sled’s undercarriage or risking balance issues on shorter forks. Well made and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: av8tor_jim

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazingly heavy duty. The price is great and they arrived very quickly. Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaOmega

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe you can have something this good delivered to you for this low price. I expected much less for the money. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Product well built used the extension on my backhoe to unload materials. Should have invested in a set a long time ago
customer_reviews.author: Richard Maestas

customer_reviews.title: Works great, slid right over the small forks we have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, slid right over the small forks we have for our tractor. Used these longer ones to move some snowmobiles around.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: They are very strong.Work great for loading pallets into the back of pickup trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim k

customer_reviews.title: When I buy something off of Amazon  I expect it to be good  and it it is .
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it it was just like I expected to. keep up the good work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for 84 inch forks. Received 72 inch forks. And now I have to pay to send them back?! I’ve been working for two days to get this resolved. Still nowhere. So frustrated to have wasted so much time and money.
customer_reviews.author: yohaus

customer_reviews.title: NOT heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Forks bent on first use. Unless you're lifting feathers, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Felix G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but double check your fork width
customer_reviews.text: They are built very nice but are rather narrow and wont fit a normal 6k forklift. Make sure to measure you forks before ordering
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as I would have liked but will work for lighter stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Arrived fast and the fork extensions are good ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Arrived fast and the fork extensions are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Titan pallet fork extensions worked great well built and sturdy also arrived promptly. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Bucci

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I may weld some keepers for a more custom fit. But they are fine out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: joscook

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: Great and heavy duty but if theres to much weight on the front they slide up the back of the mast
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful when loading larger than normal skids, which we do regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Earl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase experience
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Good price and delivered on time. Can't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be made well enough. I wouldn't lift anything particularly heavy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Grabinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I haven't used them yet other than ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I haven't used them yet other than mounting them on my skidsteer forks. They seem to be well built and should do the job. They arrived the day after ordering with standard shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Adam CB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't unload my shipment without these extensions. They worked well.
customer_reviews.author: JSG

customer_reviews.title: ... chance to use the extension yet but they look good and the delivery was very quick
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use the extension yet but they look good and the delivery was very quick, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 84" Titan Pallet Fork Extensions is just the shop needed ...
customer_reviews.text: 84" Titan Pallet Fork Extensions is just the shop needed. All is well thank-you.
customer_reviews.author: KNStar

customer_reviews.title: They look like they will do the job we need done
customer_reviews.text: They look like they will do the job we need done. we are lifting around 1,000 lbs pallets that are long
customer_reviews.author: DjH61

product_meta.title: Titan Attachments Pallet Fork Extensions for Forklifts and Loaders, Steel, 84”
product_meta.description:
Pallet fork extensions offer impressive range when it comes to lifting and moving materials. Their added length makes it easier to pick up longer and heftier materials. These extensions are an ideal asset for construction and farming jobs, allowing you to complete tasks more efficiently. These pallet fork extensions by Titan Attachments are made from sturdy high tensile steel, and their all-steel construction ensures extra durability and longevity. Because they are made from such high quality, these pallet fork extensions will withstand intemperate weather and harsh climate conditions with ease. The steel is 0.25" thick for additional protection. Our pallet fork extensions are compatible with forks that measure up to 4” wide. Our extensions also come with a steel retaining strap to keep the extensions in place. The strap has a loop-style back that keeps the forks firmly attached, so you don’t have to worry about them accidentally falling or slipping off. These pallet fork extensions are 4.5” x 1.75” x 84” and weigh approximately 94 lbs. per pair. With these extensions, you can carry lumber, logs, timber, and firewood. They’ll also help you move and install fence posts. You can even use these pallet fork extensions to clear brush and debris away from your land. This attachment is also great for moving around mounds or bales of hay. Add these extensions to your tractor parts and supplies today to start living your life to the fullest.

Features:
- Quick and simple way to lengthen your forks
- Steel retaining strap to keep extensions in place
- High lifting capacity
- Heavy duty steel construction
- Fits forks up to 4" wide

Specifications
- Weight 94 lbs per pair
- Size: 4.5" x 1.75" x 84"
- Material: 1/4" thick high tensile steel
feature_bullets: EASILY LENGTHENS YOUR BLADES: These pallet fork extensions offer a quick and simple way to extend the length of your blades. They come with a steel retaining strap to keep the extensions in place, so you don’t need to worry about them slipping off. This set of blades requires no tools, making for easy installation.

SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED FOR FORKLIFTS: These pallet fork extensions fit forks up to 4” wide. Just slide the extensions onto your current pallet forks and you’re all set! Additionally, these pallet forks won’t strain or tax your machinery, allowing you to lift larger objects than you would normally be able to with your forklift.

HIGH LIFTING CAPACITY: Sometimes your normal pallet forks just can’t quite get the job done. That’s when these pallet fork extensions come in handy. They’ll provide you with the extra support you’ll need to lift long or large objects. When you’ve got a big job to do, trust these pallet fork extensions to help you complete the task!

MADE FROM HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: At Titan, we don’t skimp when it comes to making high-quality products. That’s why our pallet fork extensions are made from high tensile steel. They measure at 0.25" thick, providing extra protection and reinforcement to your equipment. Because of their heavy-duty steel construction, these extensions won’t rust or corrode, so you can enjoy them for years to come.

DIMENSIONS: These blades measure at 4.5” x 1.75” x 84” and will fit forks up to 4” wide. These pallet forks weigh approximately 94 lbs. per pair. They’re made from 0.25-inch thick high tensile steel. When placing your order, we will need your phone number for the trucking company to schedule delivery.
